text: niṅṅaḷ eviṭeyāyirunnāluṁ maraṇaṁ niṅṅaḷe piṭikūṭunnatāṇ‌. niṅṅaḷ bhadramāyi keṭṭi uyarttappeṭṭa kēāṭṭakaḷkkuḷḷilāyāl pēāluṁ. (nabiyē,) avarkk valla nēṭṭavuṁ vannukiṭṭiyāl avar paṟayuṁ; it allāhuviṅkal ninn labhiccatāṇ enn‌. avarkk valla dēāṣavuṁ bādhiccāl avar paṟayuṁ; it nī kāraṇaṁ uṇṭāyatāṇ enn‌.paṟayuka: ellāṁ allāhuvinṟe pakkal ninnuḷḷatāṇ‌. appēāḷ ī āḷukaḷkk ent paṟṟi? avar oru viṣayavuṁ manas'silākkān bhāvamilla
